amendment.description: To prohibit the President from waiving, suspending, reducing, providing relief from, or otherwise limiting the application of sanctions pursuant to an agreement related to the nuclear program of Iran.

action.text: SA 2656 fell when SA 2640 was tabled.
Cloture on amendment SA 2656 not invoked in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 53 - 45. Record Vote Number: 266.
Cloture motion on amendment SA 2656 presented in Senate.

Amendment SA 2656 proposed by Senator McConnell to Amendment SA 2640. (consideration: CR S6643; text: CR S6643) To prohibit the President from waiving, suspending, reducing, providing relief from, or otherwise limiting the application of sanctions pursuant to an agreement related to the nuclear program of Iran.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Cloture on amendment SA 2656 not invoked in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 53 - 45. Record Vote Number: 266.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2656 proposed by Senator McConnell to Amendment SA 2640.
